articles.author: Elliot Smith, Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: European markets retreat as omicron Covid variant fears return; Stoxx 600 down 1.2% - CNBC
articles.description: European stocks pulled back on Thursday as concerns persisted over the omicron Covid variant.
articles.content: LONDON European stocks pulled back on Thursday as concerns persisted over the omicron Covid variant.The pan-European Stoxx 600 fell 1.2% in early trade, with tech stocks shedding 2.6% to lead losses … [+1652 chars]
